Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to diaper changing accommodations in certain buildings
Summary: Requires diaper changing accommodations be made available to all persons regardless of gender in certain buildings.
LawCode: Add ยง79-q, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to diaper changing accommodations in certain buildings
